price: [Inni] ni jedhe: “Dhugumatti, isiniifi abbootiin keessanis jallina ifa bahaa keessa jirtan.”
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
